pageContext.claim: “Then I said, remember I said so tell me, say the words law and order. Say it, Joe, say it. He couldn't do it, he wouldn't do it, he wouldn't do it. Because you know what? Because he'd be run out of his party if he said the words law and order.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims Biden refused to use the words "law and order" in the first presidential debate. Biden had, in fact, said the three words, arguing that he was in favor of “law and order with justice, where people get treated fairly.”
